title: Of the sympathetick powder a discourse in a solemn assembly at Montpellier / made in French by Sir Kenelm Digby, Knight, 1657.
author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.
notes: Translation of: Discours fait en une célèbre assemblée, touchant la guérison des playes par la poudre de sympathie.
Filmed from his Of bodies and of mans soul, v. 2.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
